dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, big news coming out of Kazakhstan recently, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, big news coming out of Kazakhstan recently, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely. President Tokayev, uh, met with Odile Renaud-Basso, who's the President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely. President Tokayev, uh, met with Odile Renaud-Basso, who's the President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the President of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), Odile Renaud-Basso, citing the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. And they were, like, talking about prospects for cooperation and, you know, current issues in the global economy. Pretty broad scope.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. And they were, like, talking about prospects for cooperation and, you know, current issues in the global economy. Pretty broad scope.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The two sides discussed prospects for cooperation between Kazakhstan and the EBRD and exchanged views on current issues in the global economy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And, um, they actually highlighted that there's been significant progress over the years, especially in key areas like small and medium-sized businesses, energy, and agriculture.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And, um, they actually highlighted that there's been significant progress over the years, especially in key areas like small and medium-sized businesses, energy, and agriculture.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It was noted that significant progress has been achieved over the years of cooperation in a number of strategic sectors, including the development of small and medium-sized businesses, energy, and agriculture.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's huge. And I saw something about the green transition program too, like, the EBRD wants to invest in that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's huge. And I saw something about the green transition program too, like, the E B R D wants to invest in that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State welcomed the EBRD™s intention to invest in joint projects, including within the framework of the green transition program.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Yeah, totally! And Renaud-Basso, she actually, uh, really praised Kazakhstan's investment potential.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, totally! And Renaud-Basso, she actually, uh, really praised Kazakhstan's investment potential.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso praised Kazakhstan's investment potential and expressed the bank™s interest in continuing to support the country™s infrastructure development, the Akorda press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, you know, a big deal when you're talking about, like, infrastructure development.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is, you know, a big deal when you're talking about, like, infrastructure development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Speaking of infrastructure, they just approved financing for, get this, a 234-kilometer section of the Aktobe-Ulgaysyn highway.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Speaking of infrastructure, they just approved financing for, get this, a two hundred thirty four-kilometer section of the Aktobe-Ulgaysyn highway.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Odile Renaud-Basso, the bank recently approved financing for the reconstruction of a 234-kilometer section of the Aktobe"Ulgaysyn highway, which is important for developing both domestic and international transit routes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's a massive road! Super important for, uh, both domestic and international transit, I guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's a massive road! Super important for, uh, both domestic and international transit, I guess?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Odile Renaud-Basso, the bank recently approved financing for the reconstruction of a 234-kilometer section of the Aktobe"Ulgaysyn highway, which is important for developing both domestic and international transit routes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Precisely. And she even said, like, last year's investments reached nearly a billion euros.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Precisely. And she even said, like, last year's investments reached nearly a billion euros.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She noted that last year, the volume of investments reached nearly one billion euros, and in 2024, this figure has tripled compared to 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A billion? [interrupts] And this year, it's *tripled* compared to 2023? That's insane!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A billion? And this year, it's tripled compared to twenty twenty three? That's insane!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: She noted that last year, the volume of investments reached nearly one billion euros, and in 2024, this figure has tripled compared to 2023.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Tripled, yeah! So, uh, clearly things are really moving forward successfully.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tripled, yeah! So, uh, clearly things are really moving forward successfully.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And they're still ready to support, like, improving transport accessibility and advancing the energy sector further.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're still ready to support, like, improving transport accessibility and advancing the energy sector further.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In addition, she expressed readiness to continue supporting Kazakhstan in improving transportation accessibility and advancing the energy sector.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, definitely sounds like a super successful partnership that's just, you know, gonna keep growing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, definitely sounds like a super successful partnership that's just, you know, gonna keep growing.
